data.title: Show — Aquarela
data.meta_description: Contact Aquarela Samba Group for live performing shows, private events/fundraiser, and group classes. @415.680.5326‬
data.text:
Aquarela Samba Dancers want to create a dazzling celebration just for you. Let this award-winning, professional dance group customize the perfect show to fit your event.

Aquarela is the premier Brazilian entertainment dance company in the San Francisco Bay Area. Our beautiful passistas (samba dancers) will enliven your event with sensational costumes and choreographies, bringing the sights and sounds of Rio Carnaval you. To enhance the performance, live drumming and acrobatic capoeiristas are available if desired. Let this award-winning dance group customize the perfect show for your event, and allow Aquarela to bring an authentic and dazzling Brazilian Carnaval extravaganza to you!

Aquarela has toured internationally and performs at many major events throughout California, including balls, galas, sporting events, fashion shows, parades and concerts. Some of these include the 1994 Soccer World Cup Opening Ceremonies, San Francisco Symphony’s Black and White Ball, U.S. Mayors’ Conference, Goldman Environmental Award Ceremony, and San Francisco 49ers games to name a few. Aquarela has also performed with such world renowned musicians as Carlos Santana, Cidade Negra, Daniela Mercury, and Jorge Aragão.
